name: Glutto's Alien Punch Fest
description:
Glutto needs to stop the alien objects in different rooms. There is also some objects that can be destroyed. And what better way to do it then... Well... PUNCHING STUFF! Punch your way through each room and get to the teleporter. Over time your hunger bar goes down and if you get hit by enemies or their bullets it will decrease as well. Eat food to fill your hunger bar. If your hunger goes down to 0 you fall asleep and either start at the beginning of the level or a checkpoint.

***NEW DEMO VERSION 2***

  • Controller Support
  • Credits Screen
  • Options (Fullscreen/Windowed & Volume/Mute)
  • Tutorial Level so you know how to play. Don't worry it's short.
  • More Levels. Bedroom & Closet areas instead of just Bedroom Area
  • Bug Fixes & Improvements

TRY THE DEMO!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or Arrows on Keyboard | DPAD or Left Joystick on Controller: Move
  • Mouse Movement | Right Joystick: Used to aim fist around Glutto
  • Mouse Left Click | Left Bumper or Trigger on Controller: Shoot Fist
  • Mouse Right Click | Right Bumper or Trigger on Controller: Punch Stuff
